short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension with AI summarization and chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AI Sidebar Extension is a Google Chrome extension that allows users to integrate OpenAI's GPT into their browsing experience. By updating the OpenAI API key in the settings, users can leverage AI to assist with web-related tasks directly from a sidebar. This tool would be useful for users who frequently need AI-driven assistance, such as summarizing content, generating responses, or conducting research, all without leaving their browser. It's designed for convenience and efficiency, making AI tools more accessible during everyday browsing activities.
